name: gettype
purpose: Get the type of a variable

return.description:
Possibles values for the returned string are:
   
    
     
      "boolean"
     
    
    
     
      "integer"
     
    
    
     
      "double" (for historical reasons "double" is
      returned in case of a float, and not simply
      "float")
     
    
    
     
      "string"
     
    
    
     
      "array"
     
    
    
     
      "object"
     
    
    
     
      "resource"
     
    
    
     
      "NULL"
     
    
    
     
      "unknown type"
